text: ostosis 5% Abnormality of the vertebrae - Autosomal recessive inheritance - Blepharophimosis - Broad forehead - Broad philtrum - Cleft palate - Cleft upper lip - Craniosynostosis - Cryptorchidism - Depressed nasal tip - Diastasis recti - Downturned corners of mouth - Epicanthus inversus - Highly arched eyebrow - Hip dislocation - Hypertelorism - Hypoplasia of the musculature - Joint hypermobility - Partial abdominal muscle agenesis - Postnatal growth retardation - Prominence of the premaxilla -
